newsitem.title: USA: U.S. first-quarter economic growth highest in 9 years.
newsitem.headline: U.S. first-quarter economic growth highest in 9 years.

text.p: Stronger overseas sales and brisk production for inventories pushed the economy ahead at its fastest clip in more than nine years during the first quarter, the Commerce Department said on Friday.

The department revised upward its estimate of growth in gross domestic product to a booming 5.8 percent annual rate in the three months from January through March from the already-strong 5.6 percent rate it published a month ago.
